= home =

This is the home page for a new course. <br/>
Here are some things you can do to set it up.

* First log in as the site admin or course faculty.
* On any page, click the "edit" tab to change it or upload attachments.
* Create new directories and upload files from [[ / | directory listings ]].
* Create new pages by visiting them, like this : [[ new page ]].
* Add students from the [[ /special/users ]] page.
* Edit the [[ /navigation ]] menus.
* Create [[ /special/assignments ]].
* Grade and comment on student submitted work \
  from the [[ /special/grades ]] page.

For all the details, 
check out the <a href="/help">help</a> files.
